title: The Bargaining Planner: The Adventures of Frank Thomas

story.text: In the quiet town of Midvale, Frank Thomas stumbled upon a strange amulet at a garage sale. This amulet granted him the ability to foresee future events whenever he planned or bargained. Intrigued, he bought it at half price after a clever negotiation.

Frank tested his new powers by planning his day in advance, down to the minute. When his predictions came true—from minor traffic updates to news bulletins—he realized the true potential of his powers.
Energized by his ability, Frank decided to help his community. He visited the local council and, using his foresight, helped to renegotiate wasteful contracts to save the town thousands.

With his reputation growing, Frank was called upon to mediate a dispute between neighboring towns over water rights. His planning ensured a fair and lasting agreement, causing both towns to celebrate him as a hero.

Seeing the impact of his work, Frank dedicated himself to larger challenges. He anticipated a major storm and planned an effective evacuation, saving countless lives and earning the nickname 'The Forecasting Father'.
His powers seemed invincible, but he knew to be cautious. Frank began to teach others how to plan and bargain effectively, spreading his influence and ensuring his legacy.
At week's end, Frank reflected on his unexpected journey. With a quiet smile, he planned his next move, certain of the great things to come, still wearing his lucky bargaining amulet.

ending: As the sun set on Sunday, Frank Thomas knew that even the smallest moments of planning could lead to monumental changes.
moral: Great power can emerge from simple everyday activities when pursued with wisdom and foresight.
